entries.name: element_initialize_arguments?(args)
entries.desc: This method is used inside of several different objects to determine if special behavior is needed in the constructor.

entries.name: get_file_and_line_from_caller(i=0)
entries.desc: Returns an array of two elements: the filename where the calling method is located, and the line number where it is defined.

entries.name: html_escape(s)
entries.desc: Takes a string s with some HTML in it, and escapes '&', '“', '<' and '>', by replacing them with the appropriate entities.

entries.name: new_with_value_if_need(klass, value)
entries.desc: If value is an instance of class klass, return it, else create a new instance of klass with value value.

entries.name: to_class_name(name)
entries.desc: Given a name in a name_with_underscores or a name-with-dashes format, returns the CamelCase version of name.
